metadata.researcherNotes: Comprehensive research of secondary (乙級/丙級) stars in Ziwei Doushu from multiple authoritative sources

sources.name: 紫微麥 (Ziwei.my) - 截空星介绍
紫微雲科技 - 天空星與地劫星
星星說紫微 - 旬空星
紫微麥 - 红鸾星、天喜星简单介绍
紫微麥 - 台辅星、封诰星简单介绍
易德轩紫微斗数网 - 台辅封诰

basicMeaning.zh: 月照星代表光明、照亮、清晰的象徵。具有智慧、溫和、柔性的特質。
basicMeaning.en: Yuezhao represents illumination, clarity, and brightness. Carries qualities of wisdom, gentleness, and flexibility.

negativeTraits: 容易受他人影響 (Easily influenced by others)

palaceEffects.lifePalace: 增加個人魅力與溫和特質
palaceEffects.wealthPalace: 財運平穩，但缺乏主動性
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 適合需要溝通與協調的工作

combinationEffects.withMajorStars: 與主星搭配時，可柔和主星的銳利特質
combinationEffects.withAuspiciousStars: 與吉星同宮時，運勢更佳
combinationEffects.withMaleficStars: 與凶星同宮時，可緩和其負面影響

stars.nature: 中性偏吉 (Neutral with auspicious tendency)
stars.mentionFrequency: LOW-MEDIUM (Appears in various Ziwei texts but less commonly than primary stars)
stars.notes: This star is less frequently documented in English sources. More research needed from Chinese authoritative texts.

basicMeaning.zh: 天梟星性質複雜，具有轉化與破壞的特徵。代表變遷、突破傳統的象徵。
basicMeaning.en: Tianjiao carries complex nature with transformation and disruption characteristics. Represents change and breaking traditions.

negativeTraits: 可能造成破壞 (May cause disruption)

palaceEffects.lifePlace: 個性叛逆，易與人起爭執
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 事業起伏，但易成就非凡
palaceEffects.marriagePalace: 感情易波折，婚姻變數大

combinationEffects.withTianFu: 制約天梟的負面，形成平衡

stars.researchStatus: PARTIAL - Difficult to locate in English sources
stars.notes: This star is primarily documented in Chinese texts and Ziwei schools. English documentation is sparse.

basicMeaning.zh: 旬空星象徵空缺、消散、暫時性的失去。代表命運中的 '空窗期'，事物在該時段無法圓滿實現。
basicMeaning.en: Xunkong represents void, dissipation, and temporary loss. Symbolizes 'empty periods' in destiny where matters cannot be fully realized within that time frame.

positiveTraits: 幫助調整期望 (Helps adjust expectations)
negativeTraits: 運勢落空 (Good fortune falls through)
功虧一簣 (Effort thwarted at final moment)
時間浪費 (Wasted time and effort)

palaceEffects.lifePlace: 人生存在空缺感，目標難達成
palaceEffects.wealthPalace: 財運時好時壞，難以積累
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 事業機會容易錯失，成就受限
palaceEffects.marriagePalace: 感情進展緩慢，婚期延遲
palaceEffects.healthPalace: 需注意健康檢查，小恙易被忽視
palaceEffects.relationshipPalace: 人際關係淡薄，合作難以成功

combinationEffects.withVoidStars: 多重虛耗，難度加倍 (Multiple voids = exponential difficulty)
combinationEffects.directMeaning: "遇吉化凶，遇凶化吉" (Auspicious becomes inauspicious, malevolent becomes mitigated)

stars.voidStarFamily: 四大虛星之一 (One of Four Great Voids: 地空, 天空, 旬空, 截空)
stars.timingInfluence: 特別影響於大運、流年期間 (Special influence during decade and annual luck periods)
stars.notes: One of the four void stars with temporal-spatial nature. Focus on how matters become temporarily ineffective within specific fortune periods.

stars.englishName: Jiekong / Interception Void Star / Cut Void Star

basicMeaning.zh: 截空星象徵中斷、攔截、永久性的消散。代表事物被切斷或完全無法實現的象徵。
basicMeaning.en: Jiekong represents interruption, interception, and permanent dissipation. Symbolizes things being cut off or completely unable to materialize.

negativeTraits: 黑洞效應 (Black hole effect - absorbs energy)
stars.coreCharacteristic: "見吉化凶，見凶化吉" (Auspicious becomes inauspicious; malevolent becomes fortunate)

voidStarMechanism.withAuspiciousStar: 吉星失效，好事落空 (Auspicious stars lose effectiveness, good fortune falls through)
voidStarMechanism.withMaleficStar: 凶星被吸收，災厄消解 (Malefic stars absorbed, disasters mitigated)
voidStarMechanism.mechanism: 截空如同黑洞，將所在宮位的星曜能量吸收、消散

palaceEffects.lifePlace: 人生規劃容易變數，目標難以圓滿
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 事業發展受阻，升遷無望
palaceEffects.healthPalace: 身體小恙易被忽視，大病延診

combinationEffects.description: 截空最特別的特性是反向作用
combinationEffects.dualEffect: 既可以削弱吉星，也可以削弱凶星
combinationEffects.timing: 在十年大運、流年期間影響尤其明顯

stars.voidStarFamily: 四大虛星之一 (One of Four Great Voids: 地空, 天空, 旬空, 截空)
stars.timingInfluence: 特別影響於大運、流年期間 (Especially significant during decade and annual luck cycles)
stars.notes: Most distinctive feature: its reverse mechanism where it can help by reducing harmful effects. Consider carefully in combination readings.

stars.englishName: Hong Luan / Red Phoenix Star / Wedding Star

basicMeaning.zh: 紅鸞星主婚姻、戀愛、感情的象徵。代表桃花、吸引力、感情的來臨。
basicMeaning.en: Hong Luan governs marriage, romance, and emotional connections. Represents attraction, peach blossom luck, and romantic opportunities.

positiveTraits: 個人魅力提升 (Enhanced personal charm)
negativeTraits: 可能招桃花是非 (May attract romantic complications)

palaceEffects.marriagePalace: 感情順利，婚期早至，配偶條件佳
palaceEffects.wealthPalace: 與財星搭配時，可帶來 '喜慶之財'
palaceEffects.relationshipPalace: 人際關係溫和，貴人相助

pairingWithTianXi.description: 紅鸞與天喜成對，是婚姻感情的最佳組合
pairingWithTianXi.hongLuanRole: 代表愛與婚姻的穩定性
pairingWithTianXi.combinedEffect: 兩星同現時，感情運最佳，婚姻美滿，易有子女

stars.notes: One of the two most important romantic indicator stars. Always paired with Tian Xi for complete marriage analysis.

stars.englishName: Tian Xi / Heavenly Joy Star / Birth Star

basicMeaning.zh: 天喜星代表喜樂、慶祝、生育的象徵。帶來歡樂、吉祥與新生的能量。
basicMeaning.en: Tian Xi represents joy, celebration, and fertility. Brings happiness, good fortune, and new beginnings.

positiveTraits: 易招好事 (Good events occur naturally)
negativeTraits: 可能好逸惡勞 (May become lazy)

palaceEffects.marriagePalace: 感情甜蜜，易早婚並生育
palaceEffects.wealthPalace: 財運順遂，與吉星搭配則更佳

pairingWithHongLuan.description: 天喜與紅鸞成對，婚姻感情的完美指標
pairingWithHongLuan.tianXiRole: 代表慶祝與喜樂的實現
pairingWithHongLuan.combinedEffect: 兩星同現時，代表美滿婚姻與多子女

stars.wealthPalaceEffect: 與財星結合時，代表 '喜慶之財'，透過結婚、生育、慶祝而來的財富
stars.notes: Weaker romantic indicator than Hong Luan but stronger on celebration and fertility. Key to prosperity when combined with wealth stars.

basicMeaning.zh: 台輔星是輔助星曜，代表助力、提升、裝飾的象徵。主要功能是襯托和增強主星的力量。
basicMeaning.en: Tai Fu is an auxiliary star representing assistance, elevation, and embellishment. Primary function is to enhance and support the main star.

positiveTraits: 有助力者相助 (Supported by helpers)
negativeTraits: 過度依賴他人 (Over-reliance on others)
需要他人提拔 (Needs others' support to advance)

palaceEffects.lifePlace: 眉目清秀，意志堅強，決斷力豐富。實際上聰慧過人，才能卓越。顯得聰明能幹，社會地位佳。
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 事業運更加順遂，權力提升
palaceEffects.relationshipPalace: 人際關係改善，貴人更多

pairingWithLeftAssistant.description: 台輔與左輔為傳統配對
pairingWithLeftAssistant.ideaPairing: 左輔與台輔在同一宮位最佳
pairingWithLeftAssistant.effect: 雙輔同宮時，主星力量最強

stars.mentionFrequency: MEDIUM-HIGH (Commonly referenced in auxiliary star discussions)
stars.notes: Works best when paired with Left Assistant (左輔). Its effectiveness depends on having a strong main star to enhance.

stars.englishName: Feng Gao / Seal & Proclamation Star / Merit Recognition Star

basicMeaning.zh: 封誥星代表獲得官方認可、褒獎、榮譽的象徵。現代意義上代表獎狀、嘉獎、升遷、認可。
basicMeaning.en: Feng Gao represents official recognition, commendation, and honor. In modern terms: awards, recognition, promotion, and validation.

negativeTraits: 過於看重名譽 (Overly concerned with reputation)
依賴官方認可 (Depends on external validation)

palaceEffects.lifePlace: 進入命宮時表示社會地位高。穩重、務實、聰慧、精明。世故練達，愛好藝術。追求卓越，承擔責任，易得貴人相扶，獲得高度認可，社會評價極高。
palaceEffects.careerPalace: 事業獲得官方認可，升遷順利

pairingWithRightAssistant.description: 封誥與右弼為傳統配對
pairingWithRightAssistant.ideaPairing: 右弼與封誥在同一宮位最佳
pairingWithRightAssistant.effect: 雙輔同宮時，品階顯著提升

traditionVsModern.modern: 代表企業認可、獎項、升職、社會地位

stars.mentionFrequency: MEDIUM-HIGH (Commonly referenced in auxiliary star discussions)
stars.notes: Pairs with Right Assistant (右弼) for maximum effect. Emphasizes external recognition and social validation.

stars.combinationName: 紅鸞天喜 (Hong Luan - Tian Xi Combination)

basicMeaning.zh: 紅鸞與天喜成對出現時，代表感情運最佳的象徵。主感情美滿、婚姻幸福、易有子女的運勢。
basicMeaning.en: When Hong Luan and Tian Xi appear together, they represent the best romantic fortune. Indicates happy relationships, successful marriages, and fertility.

combinedEffect.marriage: 婚期易現，配偶條件佳，婚姻美滿
combinedEffect.happiness: 生活充滿喜樂，身心愉快

hongLuan.meaning: 紅鸞代表愛與婚姻的穩定性
hongLuan.strength: 感情主導星，較強的浪漫特質

tianXi.meaning: 天喜代表慶祝、喜樂、生育
tianXi.strength: 喜樂與實現，較弱的浪漫特質

palaceSignificance.marriagePalace: 最佳位置，婚姻幸福指數最高
palaceSignificance.wealthPalace: 與財星搭配時，帶來喜慶之財

activationConditions.together: 兩星同宮或相鄰宮位時效果最強
activationConditions.transformation: 若有吉化加持，效果更佳

stars.strength: VERY HIGH - Most powerful romantic combination
stars.mentionFrequency: VERY HIGH (Frequently mentioned in authoritative texts)
stars.notes: This is the premier romantic indicator in Ziwei. Always analyze both stars together, not separately.

stars.combinationName: 台輔封誥 (Tai Fu - Feng Gao Combination)

basicMeaning.zh: 台輔與封誥成對時，代表名望、社會地位、官方認可的完美組合。主事業順利、升遷迅速、社會評價高。
basicMeaning.en: When Tai Fu and Feng Gao appear together, they represent perfect status and recognition. Indicates smooth career, rapid promotion, high social evaluation.

combinedEffect.reputation: 名望大幅提升，社會評價極高
combinedEffect.status: 社會地位提高，受人尊重
combinedEffect.recognition: 獲得官方或權威認可，獎項眾多
combinedEffect.influence: 在社會中有一定影響力

traditionalStructure.ideaPairing: 傳統配對：左輔配台輔，右弼配封誥
traditionalStructure.leftAssistant: 左輔與台輔在同宮為最佳
traditionalStructure.rightAssistant: 右弼與封誥在同宮為最佳
traditionalStructure.description: 四星齊聚時，形成最強的官運與名望格局

taiFu.function: 增強主星力量，提升氣質

fenggao.meaning: 封誥主官方認可與榮譽

palaceSignificance.careerPalace: 最強位置，事業官運極佳
palaceSignificance.lifePalace: 社會地位與個人修養俱佳
palaceSignificance.wealthPalace: 財運與名望並行，獲利於信譽

modernInterpretation.contemporary: 企業認可、職位提升、獎項、社會評價、品牌建立

stars.notes: Best understood within the context of Left Assistant & Right Assistant pairings. More effective in career/official contexts than personal ones.

starGradeSystem.description: Ziwei Doushu uses a five-tier star classification system

gradeD_E.name: 丁級/戊級星 (Grade D/E - Minor Stars)
gradeD_E.notes: Minimal use in original natal charts

voidStarSystem.description: Four Great Void Stars (四大虛星) system
voidStarSystem.definition: Void stars represent emptiness, loss, void, and temporary dissipation

fourGreatVoids.name: 旬空 (Xunkong - Cyclic Void)
fourGreatVoids.focus: Time-based emptiness, matters fail to materialize in that period

fourGreatVoids.name: 截空 (Jiekong - Interception Void)
fourGreatVoids.focus: Things cut off or completely blocked

voidStarMechanic.reverseEffect: "見吉化凶，見凶化吉" (Auspicious becomes inauspicious; malevolent becomes mitigated)
voidStarMechanic.dualNature: Can both harm auspicious outcomes and mitigate harmful ones
voidStarMechanic.blackHoleEffect: Absorbs and dissipates the energy of stars in its palace

moonlightStar.recommendation: Need access to comprehensive Chinese Ziwei texts

tianjiaoStar.recommendation: Requires consultation with Wang Ting Zhi school sources

summaryInsights.secondaryStarImportance: While 乙級/丙級 stars are secondary to the 14 main stars, they provide crucial nuance and refinement to chart interpretations
summaryInsights.combinationPower: The combination effects (especially Hong Luan + Tian Xi, and Tai Fu + Feng Gao) are more powerful than individual stars
summaryInsights.voidStarUniqueness: Void stars operate with reverse mechanics, making them exceptionally important in fortune analysis
summaryInsights.researchRecommendation: For complete understanding, consult: Zhihu (王亭之 resources), ziwei.my, and academic Ziwei systems
summaryInsights.implementationPriority: Hong Luan, Tian Xi, Xunkong, and Jiekong should be priority for system integration due to high frequency and significance
